snippet.title: Charlie Rose interview with Syrian president airs Monday
snippet.description: Charlie Rose sat down with Syrian President Bashar al-Assad on Sunday in Damascus in an interview that will air Monday on PBS and CBS News....

snippet.title: CNN moves up return of 'Crossfire,' citing Syria vote
snippet.description: With a congressional vote on Syria looming, CNN can't wait to get Crossfire started again. The network says the daily debate program will begin Monday, Sept....
